executeQuery

public org.wso2.carbon.repository.Collection executeQuery(org.wso2.carbon.repository.Registry registry,
                                                          org.wso2.carbon.repository.Resource queryResource,
                                                          Map parameters)
                                                   throws org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException
Execute a query using the query processor associated with the media type of the query.

Parameters:
registry - the registry
queryResource - the query as a resource.
parameters - the custom parameters to be passed to the query.
Returns:
a collection containing query results as children
Throws:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException - throws if the query execution failed.
